member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetContext
member.summary: Gets a context object that can be used by a handler to display properties or execute a context menu action.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the context as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetDescription
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a null-terminated Unicode buffer that contains the description.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetEventID
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to an event ID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetFlags
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a value that indicates the currently set flags, taken from members of the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetHandlerID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the handler for which the event was logged.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a handler ID as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetItemID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the item for which the event was logged.
member.param: Contains a pointer to an item ID as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetLevel
member.summary: Gets the log level of the event.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a member of the enumeration that indicates the log level.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetLinkReference
member.summary: Gets the reference for the hot link for the event. The hot link is a displayed property that the user can click to execute an action. This allows the handler to show an available action that the user can see at a glance in the folder.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a link reference as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetLinkText
member.summary: Gets the text for the hot link for the event. The hot link is a displayed property that the user can click to execute an action. This allows the handler to show an available action that the user can see at a glance in the folder. The link text is the text that is displayed to the user.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the link text as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the event. This string can be a simple name for the event or a short summary. It is displayed in the folder and in the property sheet for the event.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a name as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent.GetTime
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a creation time as a structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEvent
member.summary: Exposes methods that retrieve data from an event store. An event store allows Sync Center to get an enumerator of all events in the store, as well as to retrieve individual events.
